summary: The AgustaWestland AW101 is a medium-lift helicopter used by military and civilian groups. First flown in 1987, it was made by a British-Italian company. Many operators, like Britain, Denmark, and Portugal, call it the Merlin. It's built in England and Italy, with some parts made in Japan and the U.S. Before 2007, it was called the EH101. The AW101 started work in 1999, replacing older helicopters for tasks like transport, anti-submarine warfare, and rescue. It's also used for VIP transportation and has been in combat zones like Iraq and Afghanistan.
title: AgustaWestland AW101
